title: Атомная бомба (Radio Edition)
licensing_note: Lyrics fetched via Musixmatch API; translations via local Ollama.

lines.translation: Atomic bomb blows out the windows
lines.grammar: The verb выбивать (to blow out) is in the imperfective aspect, indicating a repeated or ongoing action.

lines.translation: And I hum na-na-na-na-na
An atomic bomb blows out glass
But I'm humming po-po-ta-ta-ta

And I hum na-na-na-na-na

They're saying something behind my back

lines.text: Но я не сльшу их прости
lines.translation: But I don't hear them, forgive me.
All circumstances, alas
Things turned out better than they could have.
I was told not to go
They said it was difficult on the way there.
Someone laughed, fuck them
Someone inspired me with words

lines.text: И я и я и я
lines.translation: And me and me and me
Listen to your heart
More good to everyone

lines.text: Я и и я и я
lines.translation: Me and me and me
Faithful to his life
After all, she is alone

lines.text: Не боюсь я высоты, если падаешь лети
lines.translation: I'm not afraid of heights if you're falling too
lines.grammar: The use of 'если' (if) with the verb 'падаешь' (are falling) is an example of a subordinate clause in Russian.

lines.text: Если по земле идти можно далеко зайти
lines.translation: If you walk on the ground you can go far

lines.text: Солнце светит одинаково я выбрал себе путь
lines.translation: The sun shines the same, I chose my path

lines.text: Он не лучше и не хуже вижу цель и к ней иду
lines.translation: He is no better and no worse, I see the goal and I go towards it.

lines.text: Нагнетают облака и я спрячу тучу под зонтами
lines.translation: The clouds are gathering and I will hide the clouds under umbrellas
Closing yourself off from yourself
The clouds are gathering and I

lines.text: Всем желаю много чуда, начинай верить в себя
lines.translation: I wish everyone many miracles, start believing in yourself
